ippoz.reload.decisionfunction

Class DecisionFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ippoz.reload.decisionfunction.DecisionFunction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterDecision, ConfidenceIntervalFunction, DoubleThresholdExtern, DoubleThresholdIntern, IQRFunction, LeftConfidenceIntervalFunction, LeftIQRFunction, LeftPositiveConfidenceIntervalFunction, LeftPositiveIQRFunction, LogThresholdDecision, RightConfidenceIntervalFunction, RightIQRFunction, StaticThresholdGreaterThanDecision, StaticThresholdLowerThanDecision, ThresholdDecision

    public abstract class DecisionFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DecisionFunction. Abstract class for decision functions.
    Author:
    Tommy

        public static DecisionFunction buildDecisionFunction(ValueSeries algorithmScores,

        Parameters:
        algorithmScores - the scores obtained during training
        thresholdTag - the threshold tag
        Returns:
        the decision function

      • checkDecisionFunction

        public static boolean checkDecisionFunction(java.lang.String thresholdTag)
        Checks if it is possible to build decision function starting from a tag.
        Parameters:
        thresholdTag - the decision function tag
        Returns:
        true, if decision function can be created
